topic.title: Emergency Care Date Seen for Treatment
topic.shortdesc: Emergency Care Date Seen For Treatment is the date that the PATIENT is seen by a clinical decision maker (a CARE PROFESSIONAL who can define the management plan and discharge the PATIENT) to diagnose the problem and arrange or start definitive treatment as necessary.
